attributes.action: We would like you to raise the penalty of dog Theft
attributes.additional_details: We would like the government to take action on this because during the global pandemic the theft of pets have significantly Increased
attributes.background: We would like the penalty of pet theft to be increased, The kidnapper of your extended member of family (your pet) should be seriously prosecuted. The current punishment does not justify the heart ache of the crime.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make dog theft a specific criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560216

Increase penalties for dog theft and illegal puppy farming
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574650

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for pet theft
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563711
